d.title: Eensymachines
d.short_desc: We are a tech-startup based in Pune, India,building Internet-Of-Things artefacts that can make your home an interesting place to live at. All the products are cloud-ready and can be controlled from anyplace that has internet.
desc: We, a bunch of creative engineers, building small electrical/electronic devices that envoy the routine/ clockwork task. Keen on solving everyday problems in a bid to make our domestic lives easier, we assemble the hardware in-house & meticulously build and test every line of working code on it.

Watching a swarm of cloud connected machines executing precise clockwork is such a delight that we went ahead to build an entire startup out of it. Now, everytime we build one thing it leads us to a next whacky idea for your home. It's like the excitement never ends.

about.p: Eensymachines was conceptualized in March of 2018 and it took shape 2021 and started its first sale in 2022. Begetter was a home-automation enthusiast who built several gadgets for his own home eventually launched it on the market shelf, after having tested it in the field.

Eensymachines focuses on getting IoT to common households, making living a fun experience. For long we have got ourseleves busy with menial jobs that could have been delegated to a swarm of tiny machines (eensy machines) which know our preferences well.
Eensymachines assembles hardware, writes/builds its software on the devices and cloud. Optimized accurate code, reliable hardware build are some of the hallmarks of it.

feedback.title: Much innovative
feedback.text: It really works! Initially I was a bit skeptical of the “controlling from anywhere” claim, but let me tell you it really works !

feedback.title: Nimble & responsive
feedback.text: The web applications they provide are really seamless, I could pick any of my devices and could send in commands at will. The system is quite responsive as well.

feedback.title: Worth the money
feedback.text: I have tried using Autolumin, and I find it my best investment till date. Now my aquarium has smart switches and I no longer have to switch on/off the accessories.
